column5: a school girl died after she collapsed in Dangkor High School in Thom Thmei village
column6: Kampot province.------The victim named Touch Sreyna
column7: a 15-year-old girl was a grade 8C  student at the Dangkor High School in Phum Thom Thmey commune. Dang Tong district of Kampot province.------The girl came to school at 3:10 pm
column9: so was immediately sent to the hospital for examination
column10: where she died.------An examination concluded that the victim had died of a heart attack. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/294634
